description:
Standoffish, reclusive Shizuku Mizutani cares far more about earning stellar grades than cultivating friendships. But her opinions on friendship and relationships begin to change when she meets habitual truant Haru Yoshida, who happens to have a rather fearsome reputation. Like Shizuku, Haru’s reputation has made it difficult to make friends. And yet through their budding friendship and stirrings of attraction the unlikely pair learns to understand one another, the world around them, and the tenor of their own emotions.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

node.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm

[Website](https://www.tomatsuharuka.com/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/tomatsuharuka-blog)

Tomatsu debuted in 2007, starring in Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica as Corticarte Apa Lagranges. Since then, she has had other major roles such as Lala Satalin Deviluke in To Love-Ru and Shiho Sannomiya in Zettai Karen Children. Before graduating from high school in 2008, she used to live in Ichimomiya city where she often took the shinkansen, traveling back and forth between Nagoya and Tokyo to attend recordings. On January 11, 2019, she married a man from outside the entertainment industry.

One of the members of the voice actress unit [Sphere](https://anilist.co/staff/103636).

__Non-anime roles:__
- Mary - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

9nine (pronounced as "nine") was a 9 person unit formed in 2005, under LesPros entertainment. They are a cluster of colourful personality, who are already actively participating in the media scene as magazine models, actresses and variety regulars. The group has been hiatus since 2019.

__Current Members:__
• [Uki Satake](https://anilist.co/staff/118492/) (佐武宇綺)
• [Hirona Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/347423/) (村田寛奈)

__Previous Members:__
• Azusa Matsuzawa (松沢梓)
• Miwako Wagatsuma (我妻三輪子)
• Ruby Katou (加藤瑠美)
• Marie Ashida (芦田万莉恵)
• Mai Yoshida (吉田茉以)
• Midori Yamaoka (山岡みどり)
• Moe Miura (三浦萌)
• Madoka Shimogaki (下垣真香)
• [Umika Kawashima](https://anilist.co/staff/107044/) (川島海荷)
• Kanae Yoshii (吉井香奈恵)
• [Sayaka Nishiwaki](https://anilist.co/staff/347402) (西脇彩華)
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
Masato Nakayama is a composer and former member of the music production group Elements Garden.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2876412506)

Representative director of [Felix Film](https://anilist.co/studio/6126/). Adept in animation and composite work.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1584883706858074112) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=arifumi_imai) 

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/). Currently freelance, with strong ties to [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).

While being an accomplished animator on [Guilty Crown](https://anilist.co/anime/10793/) and [Sengoku Basara](https://anilist.co/anime/5355/), he gained notoriety as an Action Animation Director for [Attack on Titan](https://anilist.co/anime/16498/). Imai, together with Director [Tetsurou Araki](https://anilist.co/staff/100088/), CG Director [Shuuhei Yabuta](https://anilist.co/staff/120824/), and fellow animator [Yasuyuki Ebara](https://anilist.co/staff/133640/), conceptualized how Attack on Titan's ODM gear should move in animation, and Imai himself storyboarded and animated many of its action set pieces. 

Married to [Hisako Akagi](https://anilist.co/staff/134516/).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/takuopa)__

**Takuya Matsushita** is a Japanese animation planner and producer.
